FDDI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 07 Technologist Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 15:24 IST
 Ministry of Commerce and Industry
 7 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 37,000 to 93,000




FOLLOW

The Footwear Design & Development Institute (FDDI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 07 Technologist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering, Diploma, Post-graduation, can apply for the FDDI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Uttar Pradesh.

FDDI Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Technologist	03	Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics Engineering, Post-graduation, M.E./M. Tech
Technologist	04

FDDI Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

FDDI Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

FDDI Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

FDDI Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 37,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 93,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the FDDI Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the FDDI Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the deadline. 
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	23-08-2025
Closing date	22-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
